title: Magnesium
desc:
Post 366
*This is probably someone's favorite element.*
- At any time you may turn this card into 866 **Maganese**
- Is highly flammable, but isn't prone to combustion like Sodium is. But still flammable.
- Light on fire and place on the pile. Any card that is placed on the pile is turned into a red card and always targets the user.
- Any beneficial effect the next card played is instead harmful in some ironic way, determined by the host.
